name: Grugs
summary: Are you looking for a challenging adventure platformer game to charge your nerves? How about taking on a new survival adventure designed for a thrilling reflex test action? With this amazing side scroller game, you get to experience an immersive adventure story and enjoy the best of caveman games. Run and jump with various characters to overcome the obstacle course challenges. Reach the challenging boss fight levels and show your impressive auto runner skills to become the number one caveman.
